page.title: 20GAMES AT HOME AND SCHOOL
page.content: ALEX 8yrs: My street is very quiet. Not many cars come up it so I{cycle}on the road. I live right behind Golders Green Crematorium. Once a year, in the summer, the Salvation Army come and play in our road. Everybody comes pouring up our road but we don't have to move. All we have to do is open the front window and listen. Sometimes my friend Ryusuke comes and plays with me on my{computer.}We play Aviator which is a simulator{program.}You have to pilot a Spitfire through difficult feats but I am not very good. One game I play in the school playground is{football.}We have small matches against each other. We don't use a real football, but what we normally use is a tennis-ball. We use benches as goals. To score a goal you have to get the ball under the bench. Some- times we kick the ball over the fence.
